content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Using the excerpt, answer (a), (b), and (c). Briefly explain ONE cause of the development depicted in the excerpt. Briefly explain ONE purpose of the excerpt. Briefly explain ONE way in which the historical situation of the excerpt is significant for a historical argument about the effect of Reconstruction (1865–1877) on African Americans.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
